title: Enhanced Search Listing Structure
description: Improved product listing with ₽ conversion, regional info, and stable pagination

columns.name: Фото
columns.description: Product thumbnail with lazy loading and fallback

columns.name: MPN
columns.description: Manufacturer Part Number with product title subtitle

columns.name: Описание
columns.description: Product description with proper text wrapping

columns.name: Цена ₽ (от-до)
columns.description: Price range in rubles with proper formatting

columns.name: Действие
columns.description: Primary action button linking to product detail

pagination.description: Consistent page numbering that doesn't shift on data changes

responsive.desktop: Full table layout with all columns visible

sorting.description: Clickable column headers for ascending/descending sort

loading.description: Non-blocking loading states with content placeholders

uiDesign.layout: Clean table-based layout with subtle hover effects
uiDesign.typography: System font stack for optimal cross-platform rendering
uiDesign.elevation: Subtle shadows for visual hierarchy (3 levels)
uiDesign.badges: Colored region indicators with rounded corners
uiDesign.buttons: Primary action buttons with hover/active states
uiDesign.images: 48x48px thumbnails with lazy loading and fallbacks

accessibility.focusIndicators: Visible focus outlines for keyboard navigation
accessibility.screenReader: Semantic table structure with proper headers

performance.lazyLoading: Images load only when entering viewport

russianSupport.morphology: Russian electronics terms mapped to English equivalents
russianSupport.indicators: UI shows when Russian processing is active
